mapper.select:
SELECT
Z.* FROM ( SELECT
TLM.MASTER_SEQ ,TLM.COM_CODE ,TLM.MASTER_TO_ID ,TLM.SUB_YN ,TLM.PRE_REG_YN ,FN_COM_CODE(TLM.COM_CODE) AS COM_CODE_NM ,TLM.MEMBER_SEQ ,FN_MEMBER_NAME(TLM.MEMBER_SEQ) AS MEMBER_NM ,TLM.PL_CLASS ,FN_CD_DTL('CLS001',TLM.PL_CLASS) AS PL_CLASS_NM ,TLM.PL_WORK ,TLM.CORP_USER_YN ,TLM.CAREER_TYP ,TLM.API_CAREER_YN ,FN_CD_DTL('CAR001',TLM.CAREER_TYP) AS CAREER_TYP_NM ,TLM.PL_PRODUCT ,FN_CD_DTL('PRD001',TLM.PL_PRODUCT) AS PL_PRODUCT_NM ,TLM.PL_REG_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('REG001',TLM.PL_REG_STAT) AS PL_REG_STAT_NM ,TLM.PL_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('MAS001',TLM.PL_STAT) AS PL_STAT_NM ,TLM.PL_REGIST_NO ,TLM.CON_NUM ,TLM.CI ,TLM.PL_M_NAME ,TLM.PL_M_Z_ID ,TLM.PL_M_Z_ID AS PL_M_Z_ID_ENC ,TLM.PL_M_Z_ID_EDU ,FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.PL_CELLPHONE) AS PL_CELLPHONE ,TLM.ADDR ,TLM.ADDR_DETAIL ,TLM.PL_EDU_NO ,TLM.CAREER_START_DATE ,TLM.CAREER_END_DATE ,TLM.ENTRUST_DATE ,TLM.COM_CONT_DATE ,TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NAME ,TLM.PL_CEO_NAME ,TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NO ,TLM.PL_BUSINESS_NO ,TLM.COMP_PHONE_NO ,TLM.CORP_FOUND_DATE ,TLM.CAPITAL ,TLM.VOTING_STOCK_CNT ,TLM.PL_PAY_STAT
,case when TLM.COM_REG_DATE = '' then null when TLM.COM_REG_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.COM_REG_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS COM_REG_DATE ,TLM.CRE_APP_DATE AS ORIGIN_CRE_APP_DATE ,case when TLM.CRE_APP_DATE = '' then null when TLM.CRE_APP_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.CRE_APP_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS CRE_APP_DATE ,case when TLM.FIRST_APP_DATE = '' then null when TLM.FIRST_APP_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.FIRST_APP_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS FIRST_APP_DATE ,TLM.CRE_LICENSE_DATE AS ORIGIN_CRE_LICENSE_DATE ,case when TLM.CRE_LICENSE_DATE = '' then null when TLM.CRE_LICENSE_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.CRE_LICENSE_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS CRE_LICENSE_DATE ,TLM.PAY_DATE AS ORIGIN_PAY_DATE ,case when TLM.PAY_DATE = '' then null when TLM.PAY_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.PAY_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS PAY_DATE ,TLM.SEND_MSG ,TLM.PL_HIST_CD ,FN_CD_DTL('DRP001',TLM.PL_HIST_CD) AS PL_HIST_CD_NM ,case when TLM.COM_HAEJI_DATE = '' then null when TLM.COM_HAEJI_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.COM_HAEJI_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS COM_HAEJI_DATE ,case when TLM.CRE_HAEJI_DATE = '' then null when TLM.CRE_HAEJI_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.CRE_HAEJI_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS CRE_HAEJI_DATE ,TLM.FILE_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(TLM.REG_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_TIMESTAMP ,TLM.UPD_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(TLM.UPD_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPD_TIMESTAMP ,(SELECT pay.pay_type from tb_lc_pay pay where pay.master_seq = tlm.master_seq order by pay_seq desc limit 1) AS PAY_TYPE ,(SELECT pay.name from tb_lc_pay pay where pay.master_seq = tlm.master_seq order by pay_seq desc limit 1) AS PAY_NAME ,(SELECT pay.reg_timestamp from tb_lc_pay pay where pay.master_seq = tlm.master_seq order by pay_seq desc limit 1) AS ORIGIN_PAY_REG_DATE ,(SELECT TO_CHAR(pay.reg_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD') from tb_lc_pay pay where pay.master_seq = tlm.master_seq order by pay_seq desc limit 1) AS PAY_REG_DATE FROM TB_LC_MAS01 TLM
AND TLM.PL_STAT IN ('3','4','5','6','7','9','10','11','12') AND TLM.PL_REG_STAT NOT IN ('1')
AND TLM.COM_CODE IN ( SELECT COM_CODE FROM tb_lc_work WHERE member_seq = #{regSeq} )
AND TLM.master_seq in ( select distinct master_seq from TB_LC_MAS01 a, tb_lc_file01 b where a.file_seq = b.file_grp_seq and (b.file_type = '10' or b.file_type = '11') )
)Z
AND Z.COM_CODE = CAST(#{comCode} AS INTEGER)
AND Z.PL_REG_STAT = #{plRegStat}
AND Z.PL_STAT = #{plStat}
AND Z.PL_CLASS = #{plClass} AND Z.CORP_USER_YN = 'N'
AND Z.PL_CLASS = '1' AND Z.CORP_USER_YN = 'Y'
AND Z.PL_PRODUCT = #{plProduct}
AND Z.PL_M_NAME LIKE '%' || #{plMName} || '%'
AND Z.PL_CELLPHONE LIKE '%' || #{plCellphone} || '%'
AND Z.PL_MERCHANT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{plMerchantName} || '%'
AND Z.PL_MERCHANT_NO = #{plMerchantNo}
AND Z.PL_M_Z_ID = #{plMZId}
AND Z.PL_REGIST_NO LIKE '%' || #{plRegistNo} || '%'
AND Z.MASTER_TO_ID LIKE '%' || #{masterToId} || '%'
AND Z.CRE_APP_DATE::TIMESTAMP >= #{srchDate1}::TIMESTAMP
AND Z.CRE_APP_DATE::TIMESTAMP < #{srchDate2}::TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '1 day'
AND Z.ORIGIN_PAY_REG_DATE::TIMESTAMP >= #{srchDate1}::TIMESTAMP
AND Z.ORIGIN_PAY_REG_DATE::TIMESTAMP < #{srchDate2}::TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '1 day'
AND Z.CRE_LICENSE_DATE::TIMESTAMP >= #{srchDate1}::TIMESTAMP
AND Z.CRE_LICENSE_DATE::TIMESTAMP < #{srchDate2}::TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '1 day'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_LC_MAS01_STEP ( MASTER_SEQ ,PL_REG_STAT ,PL_STAT ,PL_HIST_TXT ,REG_TIMESTAMP ,REG_SEQ ) SELECT MASTER_SEQ ,PL_REG_STAT ,PL_STAT ,CASE WHEN PL_STAT = '4' THEN FN_CD_DTL('DRP001',PL_HIST_CD) WHEN PL_STAT IN ('3','5','6','7','10','11','12') THEN PL_HIST_TXT ELSE '' END AS PL_HIST_TXT ,NOW() ,#{regSeq} FROM TB_LC_MAS01 WHERE MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq}
